ANU.name: Bradley Riley

ANU.biography: Brad Riley is a Research Fellow on the ANU's Zero Carbon Energy for the Asia Pacific: Grand Challenge working at the Centre for Aboriginal Economic Policy Research (CAEPR).

publication.title: Energy Security on remote Aboriginal communities during the COVID-19 crisis
publication.source: in F Markham, D Smith & F Morphy (ed.), INDIGENOUS AUSTRALIANS AND THE COVID-19 CRISIS: PERSPECTIVES ON PUBLIC POLICY, Centre for Aboriginal Economic Policy Research, ANU, Canberra, p. 2
